items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, very nice
items.body: Looks like it does in the pic and is true to size. Will be wearing this for many Christmases to come. Read more
items.author: Nathan Megan Staples

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the buy
items.body: Very cute, but smaller and more cropped than I expected. I am 5'4 and weigh 137 and I ordered a Medium. Just kind of a weird fit. Read more
items.author: kim walker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars so cute and festive for the holidays!
items.body: I grabbed this sweater for Christmas season and itâ€™s honestly adorable in person. The little Santa faces are playful without being too over the top and the red is bright in the best way. Itâ€™s soft, comfy, and has that slightly oversized cozy vibe that makes it perfect for holiday parties or just wearing around the house. The fit was exactly what I hoped for and it feels way nicer than I expected for the price. It definitely gave me those fun Christmas sweater feels without being itchy or bulky. It's clearly a high quality sweater that keeps you warm in the chilly season! Iâ€™m so happy I picked it up! Read more
items.author: A. T.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nope
items.body: Poorly made. Seams are very crooked and it has red threads running thru it in random places. Do not purchase. Read more
items.author: bhcordell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Festive, cozy, and great quality for the price
items.body: This is such a cute take on the classic â€œugly Christmas sweater.â€ The knit is surprisingly thick and warm, with a bit of weight to it- definitely heavier than expected, which makes it perfect for winter gatherings or holiday events. It fits well and is soft enough to wear all day without itching. I got the Elk Headâ€“Red version and love the bold, festive design. It feels fun and playful, without being too over-the-top. The cut is relaxed but still flattering, and it layers easily under a coat without bulk. Pros: â€“ Warm, heavier knit that's great for winter â€“ Soft, comfortable fabric â€“ Festive design that still feels stylish â€“ Fits true to size â€“ Great for holiday parties or casual December outfits Cons: â€“ Slightly heavier than expected (which I personally like, but may not suit everyone) Bottom line: A fun, cozy holiday sweater with great quality and comfort. If you want something festive that doesnâ€™t feel cheap, this is a solid pick for the season. Read more
items.author: LC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and Festive Holiday Sweater!
items.body: This ugly Christmas sweater is perfect for any fun holiday party or ugly sweater contest! The design is super festive and definitely stands out in a cute, funny way. Iâ€™m 5'5" and 230 lbs and ordered the XLâ€”it fit great and didnâ€™t feel tight at all, which I really appreciated. The only thing to note is that the fabric is a little rough on the skin, so I recommend wearing a tank top underneath for extra comfort. Other than that, itâ€™s warm, well-made, and totally holiday-ready. Great pick for the season! Read more
items.author: IceBear7945

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Santa Claus-black, Santa Claus-red, Elk Head-red, Santa Claus-green, Dinosaur-red, Santa Claus-pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
